channel.title: cheese on Yummy Collection
channel.description: Recent content in cheese on Yummy Collection

item.title: Burrito Bowl
item.description: Ingredients 1 onion, diced or thinly sliced 1 bell pepper, diced 1 mild red chilli, finely chopped 400g tin black beans, drained (240g, when drained) 100g uncooked brown rice 400g tin chopped tomatoes 1 Tbsp chipotle hot sauce 1 ts smoked paprika 1/2 ts ground cumin Salt, pepper To serve (either) grated cheese fresh coriander (cilantro) chopped spring onions sliced avocado sour cream Instructions Add all the burrito bowl ingredients (not toppings) to a slow cooker Cook on low for around 3.

item.title: Mushroom Risotto
item.description: Ingredients Serves 4 people 20g dried porcini mushrooms 150g mushrooms 200g oyster mushrooms 1 onion 2 garlic cloves 300g rice 120ml white wine 1.2l vegetable stock 2 spoons of butter 100g parmesan Salt pepper Instructions Soak the porcini mushrooms in 200 ml of warm water for about 30 minutes. Put the boletus on a sieve, don’t throw away the water. Peel the garlic and onion. Cut the latter into fine cubes.

item.title: Flammkuchen / tarte flambée
item.description: Servings Produces 2 Flammkuchen Ingredients: 200g flour 1 ts salt 2 Tbsp oil 110ml water Instructions: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl Knead them for 3 minutes Variations: Gratinée: with Gruyère cheese Forestière: with mushrooms Sweet: dessert version with apples and cinnamon, flambéed with Calvados
